document.full_text: the former n.f.l. coach marty schottenheimer has been hired as head coach and general manager of the virginia destroyers of the u.f.l.
document.title: schottenheimer hired to coach u.f.l. team
lines_and_colors: the former n.f.l. coach marty schottenheimer has been hired as head coach and general manager of the virginia destroyers of the u.f.l.
